thread.title: Excellent Hotel, location and great staff
thread.title_full: Excellent Hotel, location and great staff - Review of Hotel Banke, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Robert Alex G
title: Excellent Hotel, location and great staff
text: I couldn't be happier with our hotel stay in Paris! The breakfast was great, much better than anticipated for a breakfast included in a stay. The location is great, walking distance to everything, great shopping nearby and great restaurants, places for coffee and food right down the road or around corners. The staff are very knowledgeable, speak great english and want to help make your stay enjoyable!
